idea:
We are from Jauhar clothing - an Indian brand for Mom-to-bes and Breastfeeding Moms. We design amazing Dresses with Invisible zips and super comfortable fabric.

Our products are inspired from Rajasthan’s Sanganeri fabrics also known as Jaipuri prints and available in Cotton and Rayon. Most Comfortable Smart and Elegant Maternity Dress for every mom, Made with Finest Quality of Breathable Cotton and Rayon Fabric to give the smoothest touch and carefully hand designed to fit the changing body shape during and Post pregnancy. These dresses are great to wear at work, Events and Even Maternity Photo-shoot Dress. Majestic Combination of Style with comfort, this printed Maternity Dress is a must add to the Maternity Wear Wardrobe, it can be worn during pregnancy and post pregnancy as a feeding Dress for easy nursing and hence value for money.

Maternity Dress with breathable fabric allows air circulation and keeps you cool. This Feeding Dress can also be worn as

maternity kurti and will give you a trendy look when clubbed with leggings or Maternity Denim. The nursing Dress is

lightweight, breathable, stretchy & incredibly soft to the skin. The discreet zipper makes feeding extremely easy and

anywhere, anytime.

- Invisible Vertical Zipper - This soft Gown with Feeding Zips features 2 side Vertical Zippers for easy baby feeding. This great feature is also convenient as a maternity nursing Dress because you can easily open and close it to suit your sleepwear needs and also a great Dress for work wear and home use.

- Double layers – The Dress has smart discreet feeding access with a concealed zipper. It is the perfect maternity Dress for everyday Stylish wear as well as Maternity office wear. It is very easy to pump & breastfeed. With laps below the zips,it avoids irritation caused by Zips brushing against your body.
name: Jauhar Clothing

idea:
Give for Sports Foundation is a nonprofit organisation setup to build awareness and raise funds for Sports NGOs and underprivileged athletes.


The foundation will further focus on working with large Indian companies to enable spending on sport using their Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) budgets.
name: Give for Sports Foundation

idea:
MedFiles is a startup based on healthcare with an aim to manage your medical history that will help you retrieve them easily at times of emergencies. It is very difficult before appointments to gather up your previous medical records and can be very challenging to store them for long periods of time. At times of emergency/accidents, understanding the various profiles of the patient can be tough and time consuming. With the help of tests already performed and submitted, this could cut down on time and save lives. Familial medical history and previous patient profiles play a very important role in delivering a better therapy route for the disease of problems that our body might be undergoing for a long time. 

We wish to provide the citizens of India with a very safe place to store their medical files and have them accessed anytime, anywhere, with whoever they wish to share it with. This information will be end-end encrypted that would ensure that their data is not sold to people. With this service, they can also decide what data needs to be shared to their medical practitioners and for how long. The service aims at giving a platform for organization of the heaps of medical profiling that the medical institutions themselves struggle maintaining. 

The future of MedFiles aspires to be in hands of all emergency officers that can save lives with their MedFile profile when things can be very ambiguous and challenging. We wish that the Indian government understands the importance of this startup and adopts it under their umbrella.
name: MedFiles

idea: Balance AI App is India's first AI based personal finance manager with primary objective of monitoring your Financial Wellness on your finger tips. App helps to capture financial transactions automatically and securely without login into bank account, it categorises, provides insights and analytics for users to see trends and achievements. App seamlessly integrates other features like Bill Splitting between friends, Credit management, Credit score, Bill management etc. App also has embedded some of India's first features like Chatbot for cross platform financial enquiry, Loan a friend feature, Rent Management, Digital Book Keeping and many more. Our aim is to be Google of Financial utility services for an average user, which means we want help, facilitate and manage User's financial requirements throughout their life.
name: EKAMRA VENTURES LLP

idea:
We let people convert their podcasts into text.

This helps them to get more subscribers for their podcast.


One of the biggest benefit is SEO, since search engines can now index their podcast.

The other big benefit is that potential listeners can quickly scan their earlier podcasts and judge if they want to subscribe.
name: Podcast Transcribe
